============= TraceAncestor =============
----------- Description -----------
Build a mosaic from sequence data and diagnosis snp.
------ Inputs ------
matrix table: Matrix with ancestry informative markers. (Output from the tool Markers Detector). The first column names schould be :
ancestor chromosome position allele
- ancestor = Ancestor names - chromosome = Chromosome numbers - position = Position of the DSNP marker - allele = Base of the ancestral allele
vcf of the hybrid population: vcf with allele specific depth information. Individu names should not have space in their names.
color file: Color file where the user can choose one color for each ancestor for the painting. Indeterminations (NA) will always be grey. If you use the ideogram output of all the hybrids, the bands between chromosoms will always be black.
ploidy: ploidy of the hybrid population (2, 3 or 4).
number of markers by windows: number of markers by window (default = 10).
LOD value : lod value to conclude for one hypothesis or an other (default = 3)
threshold of the calcul of LOD score: threshold for the calcul of LOD score. Acceptable sequencage error rate (default = 0.99)
Window size (in k-bases): number of K bases for one window (default = 100)
One hybrid to focus on: particular hybrid you want to focus on (optional). If -f not indicated.
focus file (several hybrids): file containing several hybrids to focus on (more than one). If -i not indicated (optional). If -i and -f are blank, focus on all hybrids.
------ Ouputs ------
Ancestors frequency along the chromosomes: frequency of ancestors alleles along chromosome for every hybrid focused
Ideogram painting: An Ideogram output compatible with the tool ideogram. http://genomeharvest.southgreen.fr/visu/ideogram/newindex.php If the focus is made on only one hybrid -> One ideogram bar = one chromosome. If the focus is made on several hybrids -> One ideogram bar = one genome (chromosome jointed)
Chromosomes length for ideogram: An Ideogram output compatible with the tool ideogram. If the focus is made on only one hybrid -> Chromosome length. If the focus is made on several hybrids -> Sum of chromosomes length.
Circos painting: Only for a focus on several hybrid. An output compatible whith the tool circos. http://genomeharvest.southgreen.fr/visu/circosJS/demo/index.php
Chromosomes length for circos: An output compatible whith the tool circos. Length of chromosomes.
